sqlReaderQuery.value:
with rdw_obj as ( 
	SELECT 
		 null external_obj_id -- this is an object id outside betl for this object. 
		  , server_type_id 
		  , 'sqls-betl-dev' server_name 
		  , 'sqldb-rdw' db_name 
		  , 'rdw' schema_name 
  	  , isnull(o._source + '_','') + o.obj_name+ '_h' obj_name 
		  ,10 [obj_type_id]  -- table
		  ,_source
		 , o.[obj_id] src_obj_id -- this is the betl internal reference to the main object/table that acted as a source for this object
	--select * 
	from dbo.obj_ext o
	where 
	obj_type = 'table'
	and db_name = 'sqldb-rdw'
	and schema_name = 'staging_aw'
	and o._delete_dt is null 
	and o.is_definition=0
)
, rdw_col as ( 
SELECT 
	 o.external_obj_id -- this is an object id outside betl for this object. 
	  , o.server_type_id 
	  , o.server_name 
	  , o.db_name 
      , o.schema_name 
	  , o.obj_name
	  , o.[obj_type_id] 
      ,c.ordinal_position -- stays the same
      ,c.column_name
      ,c.column_type_id
      ,c.is_nullable
      ,c.data_type
      ,c.max_len
      ,c.numeric_precision
      ,c.numeric_scale
      ,null primary_key_sorting -- redefine prim-key
      ,c.default_value -- just copy contents. Do not use source system defaults. 
      ,o._source
	 , o.src_obj_id -- this is the betl internal reference to the main object/table that acted as a source for this object
from rdw_obj o
inner join dbo.col c on c.obj_id= o.src_obj_id
where 
c._delete_dt is null
and c.is_definition =0
) , rdw_obj_2 as ( 
SELECT 
	 o.external_obj_id -- this is an object id outside betl for this object. 
	  , o.server_type_id 
	  , o.server_name 
	  , o.db_name 
      , o.schema_name 
	  , o.obj_name 
	  , o.[obj_type_id] 
      ,o.ordinal_position -- stays the same
      ,o.column_name
      ,o.column_type_id
      ,o.is_nullable
      ,o.data_type
      ,o.max_len
      ,o.numeric_precision
      ,o.numeric_scale
      ,o.primary_key_sorting
      ,o.default_value -- just copy contents. Do not use source system defaults. 
      ,o._source
	 , o.src_obj_id -- this is the betl internal reference to the main object/table that acted as a source for this object
FROM rdw_col o
union all 
select 
	 o.external_obj_id -- this is an object id outside betl for this object. 
	  , o.server_type_id 
	  , o.server_name 
	  , o.db_name 
      , o.schema_name 
	  , o.obj_name 
	  , o.[obj_type_id] 
	,c.[ordinal_position]
	,lower(replace(c.[column_name], '{{obj_name}}', o.obj_name)) column_name 
	,c.[column_type_id]
	,c.[is_nullable]
	,c.[data_type]
	,c.[max_len]
	,null [numeric_precision]
	,null [numeric_scale]
	,c.[primary_key_sorting]
	,c.[default_value]
      ,o._source
	 , o.src_obj_id -- this is the betl internal reference to the main object/table that acted as a source for this object
FROM rdw_obj o
cross join [static].[Column] c 
where c.rdw=1 
) 
select 
  external_obj_id -- this is an object id outside betl for this object. 
	  ,    server_type_id 
	  ,    server_name 
	  ,    db_name 
      ,    schema_name 
	  ,    obj_name 
	  , [obj_type_id] 
	  , row_number() over (partition by src_obj_id order by [ordinal_position] asc) [ordinal_position]
	,column_name 
	,[column_type_id]
	,[is_nullable]
	,[data_type]
	,[max_len]
	,[numeric_precision]
	,[numeric_scale]
	,[primary_key_sorting]
	,[default_value]
      ,_source
	 , src_obj_id -- this is the betl internal reference to the main object/table that acted as a source for this object
       , null obj_def_id
from rdw_obj_2
